title: Hour 1: Three Cheers
description:
Kendrick Perkins and Chris Russo discuss whether the Lakers should run it back with their current Big Three and where Kevin Durant should play next season. The guys debate on who should have the power in the NBA. Dan Orlovsky stops by to talk about where Ja'Marr Chase ranks among NFL WRs.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Should the Lakers run it back with LeBron, Davis, and Westbrook?
